skills.description: <ONCE PER TURN> Choose 1 red 〈Son Goku : Br〉 card or red 〈Vegeta : Br〉 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area : Draw 2 cards, then choose up to 1 card in your life and add it to your hand.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 of your energy, switch it to Active Mode, and flip this card over.
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.

<ONCE PER TURN> Choose 1 red card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area : If there are 2 or more red 〈Son Goku : Br〉 cards and 2 or more red 〈Vegeta : Br〉 cards in your Drop Area, and it's your turn, your opponent can't activate <COUNTER> skills with energy costs of 2 or more for the duration of the turn, and this card gets +5000 power and <DOUBLE STRIKE> for the duration of the turn.
You can't include Battle Cards with energy costs of 3 or less in your deck.
<ONCE PER TURN> Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 red Extra Card among them, and add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 2 cards and flip this card over.
<ONCE PER TURN> Draw 1 card.

When this card is attacked by a Battle Card, you may choose 1 red 《Frieza's Army》 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area. If you do, negate that attack and this skill for the duration of the turn.

<SPARKING 3> When you play this card from your hand, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 red 〈Vegeta : Br〉 card among them and play it in Rest Mode, then shuffle your deck.
This card gets +10000 power and can attack Battle Cards in Active Mode for the duration of the turn.
At the end of your turn, return this card to its owner's hand.

<SPARKING 2> (This skill takes effect when you have 2 or more cards in your Drop Area.) When you play this card, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 〈Gogeta : Br〉 card or red 〈Vegeta : Br〉 card among them and add it to your hand, shuffle your deck, then if you added a card to your hand, choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area.
<ONCE PER TURN> This card gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
At the end of your turn, return this card to its owner's hand.

<ONCE PER TURN> This card gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
At the end of your turn, return this card to its owner's hand.

<ONCE PER TURN> This card gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
At the end of your turn, return this card to its owner's hand.

When you play this card, if your Leader Card is a black 《Shenron》 card and there is a 《God》 card in play in your Battle Area, draw 2 cards, then choose all of your opponent's cards in their Battle Area ignoring <BARRIER> and place them in their owners' Drop Areas, and your opponent can't activate skills on cards other than their Leader Card until the end of their next turn.

This card gains 《Desire》 in all areas.

Choose 2 Battle Cards from your Drop Area with energy costs of 4 or less and 15000 power or more, and 2 Battle Cards from your opponent's Drop Area with energy costs of 4 or less and 15000 power or more : If your Leader Card is a 《Shenron》 card, play the chosen cards from your opponent's Drop Area in their Battle Area, then play the chosen cards from your Drop Area in your Battle Area in Rest Mode.

Choose up to 1 of your Battle Cards or Leader Cards, it gets +5000 power for the duration of the battle, and if it's a skill-less Battle Card it gets an additional +5000 power for the duration of the battle.

If your Leader Card is a 《Shenron》 card : Draw 4 cards, then choose 2 cards from your hand and place them in your Drop Area.

If your Leader Card is a 《Shenron》 card : Draw 4 cards, then choose 2 cards from your hand and place them in your Drop Area.

|TWO| : If this card is in Rest Mode, choose your opponent's Leader Card, switch it to Rest Mode, and it can't be switched to Active Mode until the end of your opponent's next turn.

When 1 of your green Battle Cards with an energy cost of 7 or more is removed from a Battle Area by a skill or KO'd, activate this skill. You may choose all cards other than this card from your hand and place them in your Drop Area, and if you do, play this card from your hand.
When this card attacks, if your life is at 1, your opponent chooses all of the cards in their hand and places them in their Drop Area.
<SIX> , choose 1 〈Evil Wizard Babidi〉 card in your Drop Area or Warp : Play the chosen card, then play this card from your hand on top of the card you played with this skill.
When you play this card, if there is an 〈Evil Wizard Babidi〉 card under this card, choose up to 5 《Agent of Destruction》 cards from your Drop Area or Warp and play them.
